p: By 2015, a series of discoveries had resulted in a thorough characterization of the PC and TC architecture. Finally, in the three-year period between 2016 and 2018, the cellular receptors for these complexes were identified as well, thus paving the way for the study of HCMV infection/disease pathogenesis and the adoption of adequate measures for prevention and the development of an effective HCMV vaccine.
